Description:
Detects instances where an NTP service on an OpenCanary node has had a NTP monlist request.

Author: Security Onion Solutions
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: OpenCanary - NTP Monlist Request
Query: sourcetype like 'opencanary-%' eql select * from _source_ where logtype = '11001'
